original_text: And the Lord said furthermore unto him, Put now thine hand into thy bosom. And he put his hand into his bosom: and when he took it out, behold, his hand was leprous as snow.
korean_text: 여호와께서 또 그에게 이르시되 네 손을 품에 넣으라 하시매 그가 손을 품에 넣었다가 내어보니 그의 손에 나병이 생겨 눈 같이 된지라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said furthermore unto him
Put now thine hand into thy bosom
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 네 손을 네 품에 넣으라

sentences.original_text: And he put his hand into his bosom
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 손을 그의 품에 넣으니

sentences.original_text: and when he took it out
behold, his hand was leprous as snow
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 그의 손은 눈처럼 문둥병에 걸렸더라
